title: Mark Ou
text: Welcome to my corner of the web! It’s a pleasure to meet you virtually. I’m Mark, a Ph.D. student delving into the captivating realm of computational genetics at Uppsala University. My journey involves unraveling the complexities of genetic data through statistical methodologies, focusing on elucidating the intricate genetic underpinnings of growth-relative traits. Beyond the lab’s confines, I find solace in exploring the world, immersing myself in varied cultures, and embracing the enriching experiences of travel. Join me as I navigate the fascinating intersections of science, exploration, and personal growth.
